entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023
